name: team_game_stats
description: This table contains team stats for individual games.

columns.name: pts_q1
columns.description: Number of points scored by the team in the 1st quarter.

columns.name: pts_q2
columns.description: Number of points scored by the team in the 2nd quarter.

columns.name: pts_q3
columns.description: Number of points scored by the team in the 3rd quarter.

columns.name: pts_q4
columns.description: Number of points scored by the team in the 4th quarter.

columns.name: pts_ot1
columns.description: Number of points scored by the team in the 1st overtime.

columns.name: pts_ot2
columns.description: Number of points scored by the team in the 2nd overtime.

columns.name: pts_ot3
columns.description: Number of points scored by the team in the 3rd overtime.

columns.name: pts_ot4
columns.description: Number of points scored by the team in the 4th overtime.

columns.name: pts_ot5
columns.description: Number of points scored by the team in the 5th overtime.

columns.name: pts_ot6
columns.description: Number of points scored by the team in the 6th overtime.

columns.name: fg_pct
columns.description: Team's Field Goal Percentage in a game. It's the ratio of made goals to attempted goals.

columns.name: ft_pct
columns.description: Team's Free Throw Percentage in a game. It's the ratio of made free throws to attemtped free throws.

columns.name: fg3_pct
columns.description: Team's Three Point Field Goal Percentage in a game. It's the ratio of made 3-pointers to the total number

columns.name: ast
columns.description: A number of team assists in a game.

columns.name: reb
columns.description: A number of team rebounds in a game.

columns.name: tov
columns.description: A number of team turnovers in a game.
